title: Starter Pack
description: Perfect for beginners who want to start their fitness journey with essential access and light support.
features: Access to gym equipment during weekdays (Monday to Friday)
1 complimentary personal training session per month
Free access to cardio zone (treadmill, cycling, cross trainer)

title: Fitness Pro
description: Ideal for regular fitness enthusiasts who want complete access to equipment, group classes, and expert guidance.
features: Unlimited gym access 7 days a week
5 personal training sessions with certified trainers
Access to group fitness classes like Yoga, Zumba, and HIIT
Personalized diet consultation with in-house nutritionist
Access to steam room and sauna for recovery

title: Ultimate Beast Mode
description: Designed for athletes and bodybuilders who demand high-performance training, recovery, and nutrition facilities.
features: 24/7 unlimited gym access including VIP training hours
Daily one-on-one personal training with elite coaches
Advanced body composition analysis and performance tracking
Tailored meal plans based on fitness goals and body type
